SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc26
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.ui

Interface UpdateInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
GUIUpdate, TUIUpdate
public interface UpdateInterface
The UpdateInterface provides methods for updating various components of the game's view from the server. Implementing classes should define how these updates are handled.
